name: Car Dodge (Kevin Bergin)
overview: A driving game by Kevin Bergin released in the book "Commodore 64 Games" in 1984. In this game you test your driving skills against the random roads created by the program to try to keep your tires on the pavement. You set your speed once at the start of the game and just try to keep it on the blacktop and avoid the obstacles and curves. One of two games named Car Dodge by Duckworth Home Computing, the other is by Richard Franklin and is around a single track.
